This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was niominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A member of Teddy Roosevelts Roughriders returns to Diablo to take the valuable land he had been promised. When he arrives, he discovers that the land is part of an Indian reservation. Things quickly turn from bad to worse when a corrupt land agent frames the man for murdering a brave with the hope of inciting an Indian war, which he will use for his own desires for the valuable land. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A doll seems to cast a spell on Little Snowbird (Rochelle Goldstein). Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in December, 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Since the arrival of a Lt. Smith, members of the Iroquois tribe keep turning up dead. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired December 25, 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben helps three deserters, escaped from an Army stockade. Learning what they had to deal with, Ben promises to share the truth with his friend who is in charge of the fort.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Wildfire: The Story of a Horse
programme.desc: Fanning (John Miljan) has his men rustle horses and then blame it on a wild horse named Wildfire. Happy and Alkali arrive and immediately get into trouble with Fanning and his men. When Alkali is shot, Happy catches the outlaws but the Judge not only releases them, he discharges the Sheriff and tries to arrest Happy for rustling! Starring Bob Steele and Sterling Holloway, directed by Robert Emmett Tansey. 1945 (Color).

programme.title: Boots and Saddles
programme.desc: When a young Englishman inherits a ranch, none other than Gene Autry takes up the challenge of turning the Brit into a real westerner. He convinces the Brit to use the ranch to raise horses, but things quickly grow complicated. Look for the usual cast of characters from Republic Pictures, including Smiley Burnette (as the irresistible Frog Millhouse!). Songs include Take Me Back To My Boots and Saddle, and Ridin the Range.

programme.title: Heart of the Golden West
programme.desc: Roy Rogers, Gabby Hayes, and Smiley Burnette team up to protect the ranchers of Cherokee City from the false charges of illegal cattle trafficking. It may seem like the odds are against Roy, but just watch as he changes the course of the law with his flaming bullets, and, of course, a few songs. For trivia buffs: Smiley Burnette joined Roy because Gene Autry, the actor for whom he usually served as a sidekick, had joined the service!

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: Sierra Nevada Jones, a feisty young woman, attempts to stake her claim in the cattle business despite threats from greedy land grabbers and their hired killers.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Baseball superstar Gehrig is one of several ranchers being coerced by a bunch of bandits. His sister and her lawyer/lover organize the ranchers. Directed by Ray Taylor; starring Smith Ballew, Gehrig, Evelyn Knapp. Talk about stunt casting! Gehrig was a New York Yankees star who was nearing the end of his career, but one of the biggest sports stars in the country. In the movie he plays a variation of himself, as Lou Gehrig, a retired baseball player who takes up ranching. Lou expects to relax on his ranch but quickly joins other ranchers in a fight to protect their properties.

programme.title: The Trail Beyond
programme.desc: Rod Drew (John Wayne) is in search of a missing miner and his daughter in this Lone Star Picture. Along the way, Drew rescues his pal Wabbi (Noah Beery Jr.) from card cheats who have framed him for murder. You'll find plenty of action and suspense in this vintage horse opera, originally distributed by the kings of the B western, Monogram Pictures!

programme.title: American Empire
programme.desc: This epic of America's westward march stars Leo Carrillo and Preston Foster in a tale of men building a cattle empire, only to battle rustlers, the weather, and each other! The romantic adventure from director William C. McGann (In Old California, Alcatraz Island) features a strong leading performance by Oscar nominated RKO star Richard Dix (Cimarron, The Ghost Ship) plus cinematography by six-time Oscar nominee Russell Harlan (To Kill a Mockingbird, Rio Bravo).

programme.title: Riders of the Deadline
programme.desc: The 50th of 66 Hopalong Cassidy films finds Hoppy in a vengeful mood. When his good friend Tim Mason is unjustly sent to jail and then killed when trying to escape, Hoppys bitterness gets him drummed out of the Texas Rangers. With the help of his pals California Carson and Jimmy Rogers, he sets out to expose the real culprits and clear Tims name. The usual cast is here, including William Boyd as Hoppy, plus Andy Clyde, Jimmy Rogers, and in one of his earliest roles, Robert Mitchum.

programme.title: Raiders of Red Gap
programme.desc: Bob's Playin' A Mystery Hand... He's Marked For Death By Killer Bullets As Gunfire Echoes Over The Plains! After one of his ranch hands is killed when a gang attacks his ranch, Jim Roberts joins forces with his neighbor in an effort to fight off the Bennett Cattle Co., a company looking to rob them of their land. Things get increasingly dangerous as the company hires Butch Crane, a professional killer, to stop them. Directed by Sam Newfield (Racing Luck (1935), Go-Get-Em, Haines (1936)), Raiders of Red Gap stars Robert Livingston (The Three Mesquiteers (1936), Larceny on the Air (1937)) as Rocky (Lone Rider) Cameron and Al St. John (Billy the Kid Trapped (1942), Border Feud (1947)) as...

programme.title: The Fighting Redhead
programme.desc: When a rustler named Faro kills one of his own henchmen and blames it on Sheila O'Conner, Red and Little Beaver set out to clear Sheila and to find evidence against Faro and his gang.

programme.title: The Gunman from Bodie
programme.desc: The Rough Riders, a popular group that thrilled audiences in the early 1940s, are after a gang of rustlers in this B-western from Hollywood's Poverty Row. Starring Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, and Raymond Hatton, this movie features everything from lawmen going undercover to the Rough Riders looking after an orphaned baby! Also, be on the lookout for the beautiful Christine McIntyre, who would go on to appear in several of the Three Stooges shorts for Colombia Pictures.

programme.title: The Red Rope
programme.desc: Hired killers and Old West outlaws stand front and center in this riveting tale from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Bob Steele, one of the busiest stars in movie history (everything from the silent era to Republic Pictures to working with Clint Eastwood in Hang Em High) is here as Tom Shaw, the target of a bad mans desperation and hate. Steele appeared in more than 240 movies and television shows, but was never more impressive than in The Red Rope!

programme.title: Springtime in the Sierras
programme.desc: Ads for this Roy Rogers classic roared HEAD FOR THE MUSICAL HILLS...ROY IS GUNNIN' FOR THRILLS! And thrills are what you'll get when you watch this fun, action packed B-Western from Republic Pictures. There's some great comic relief from Andy Devine and Chester Conklin, two of Hollywood's all-time greats. This old-fashioned shoot-'em-up was directed by William Witney, who would go on to direct many of television's top western sagas, including Bonanza, Wagon Train, and The Wild, Wild West.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to San Pablo, Mexico, to find out what's behind the trouble an American tungsten mine is having. When they arrive, they discover the mine has been closed, the wells are all poisoned and the town is in the grip of a malaria epidemic. To make matters worse, the lawmen have been followed by four gunslingers determined to give the American troubleshooters all the trouble they can handle - and more. Russell Hayden stars.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney tangle with a gang of robbers who have hijacked an Army payroll. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. Originally aired on NBC.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate hires Herby to work as an assistant manager at the hotel, causing Uncle Joe to fear for his position. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to advertise Shady Rest as a hotel for honeymooners.But is Hooterville really the best place for a honeymoon? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid

This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark goes undercover working at a gambling den. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Episode first aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955. Also starring Dick SImmons, Claire Carleton, Mauritz Hugo, Howard Wright, and Douglas Evans.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Frankie is shot during a robbery. Episode first aired in 1954. Produced by B movie veteran Edward White. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, an outlaw gang plans to take over the town by getting Judge Bean to resign over false charges of misconduct. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this epsiode, Storts and Hurley are holding hostage a doll that brings good luck to a Mexican village. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Diablo is in danger when a gang of hired killers comes to town. Lofty finds himself conflicted as he is reluctant to take on the gang once he discovers the leader rescued him back in their days in the U.S. Cavalry. With the state senator possibly the target of the gang, the townspeople call for Lofty to resign amid his reluctance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primtetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Dave Morgan, an honest lawyer, faces off with Carter Holmes, a crooked politician, in a fiery election campaign. Things take a turn for the worse when Holmes attempts to have his opponent killed. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye learns that his brother has joined the British army and is now a redcoat. However, when he is murdered by a treacherous Indian companion, Hawkeye seeks revenge. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook come across a group of settlers trapped in the Huron's territory.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben and Adam are in jail, about to be hung for a crime they didn't commit. Joe and Hoss must find out why the witnesses to the alleged crime have lied about what happened before the execution takes place. They receive help from a vagrant named Lassiter who is looking for the men who committed a lynching in Kansas years ago.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bells of San Angelo
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Dale Evans team up in this tale of silver mines, kidnappings, and secret passages. Roy plays a border guard who has to rescue Dale from the clutches of underhanded miner Rex Gridley (John McGuire). How does he do it? With help from Trigger, of course! With a cast that inclues Andy Devine as Sheriff Cookie Bullfincer, director William Witney gives us an enjoyable drama from the golden era of Republic Pictures!

programme.title: Colorado Sundown
programme.desc: Murder among ranchers is the subject of this Republic Pictures drama. Starring such names as Rex Allen, Slim Pickins, and Chester Clute, this feature was directed by William Whitney. For Trivia Buffs: At one time Whitney was known as the youngest director in Hollywood, having been hired by the newly formed Republic Pictures at the tender age of 21.

programme.title: Captain Apache (Edited Version)
programme.desc: After Harry T. Collier, a beloved commissioner of Indian Affairs, is murdered in late March during the1880s, Captain Apache, an Indian graduate of West Point, is assigned by the army to investigate the crime. Suspecting that O.J., the sheriff of a town bordering the reservation may be involved in the killing, Apache travels there and finds the sheriff dining with his mistress Maude at the Paradise Saloon. Before Apache can question him, however, O.J. abruptly departs and rides out of town with Apache in pursuit. When Apache apprehends him, O.J. swears that he did not kill Collier and relates that the agents dying words were April Morning. Meanwhile, Griffin, a wealthy landowner and six of...

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: After a condemned gunfighter (Steve Forrest) survives his own hanging, he helps a young widow stop a pitiless land baron from taking her ranch. This television feature boasts a strong cast of recognizable characters, including Will Geer, Sharon Acker, Dean Jagger, BarBara Luna, and Cameron Mitchell. Director Michael Caffey would go on to work on such hit shows as Barnaby Jones and MacGyver. Also, look for John Mitchum, younger brother of Robert, in a small role. This movie originally aired on ABC-TV and was considered the pilot for a possible series. Writer/producer Andrew Fenady was behind several opular TV shows such as Branded and The Rebel, as well as the 1970 John Wayne feature, Chisum.

programme.title: Winds of the Wasteland
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this Republic Pictures western about the final days of the Pony Express. Former rider John Blair (Wayne) enters a coach race to win a $25,000 government mail contract, but there are dozens of obstacles in his path. The rest of the cast includes Lane Chandler and Phyllis Fraser, plus Lew Kelly (Lady of Burlesque) doing a great comic turn as Rocky OBrien, the eccentric, self-proclaimed mayor of a deserted mining town.

programme.title: Zaginiona dziewczyna
programme.desc: ZAGINIONA DZIEWCZYNA - w reżyserii Davida Finchera i oparta na światowym bestsellerze Gillian Flynn - ujawnia tajemnice skrywane przez współczesne małżeństwo.

programme.title: Ares
programme.desc: Francja przyszłości. Władze próbują zapobiec buntowi głodujących ludzi, oferując im brutalny program telewizyjny z udziałem ich samych.

programme.title: Zjawa
programme.desc: Hugh Glass zostaje zaatakowany przez niedźwiedzia. Ledwo żywy, pozostawiony na pewną śmierć, wbrew wszystkiemu stara się przeżyć. Zmagając się z bezlitosnymi zimowymi warunkami, desperacko brnie przez dzikie tereny, gnany miłością do rodziny i nieokiełznaną żądzą zemsty.

programme.title: Seks, Kłamstwa i Obsesje
programme.desc: Każdy, kto poznałby doktora Camerona Thomasa (Harry Hamlin), pomyślałby, że ma wszystko - wspaniałą żonę, dobrze prosperujący gabinet, dwóch wspaniałych synów. Ale za tą fasadą kryje się niebezpieczne uzależnienie od seksu, które po ujawnieniu wywraca wszystko w jego życiu do góry nogami.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: 17-letni David i 15-letnia Jade (Brooke Shields) znajdują się w namiętnym romansie.Ale w miarę jak ich związek staje się coraz bardziej intensywny, zaczyna się to robić - a kiedy David jest wykluczony z widzenia Jade, rozwija się łańcuch tragicznych wydarzeń.

programme.title: Operacja: Zemsta
programme.desc: Kiedy były żołnierz dowiaduje się o śmierci swojego najlepszego przyjaciela, postanawia dotrzeć do prawdy i wymierzyć sprawiedliwość winnym. stanowi jedynie część wielkiego spisku. Teraz będzie musiał po kolei eliminować sprawców.

programme.title: Fantastyczny Pan Lis
programme.desc: Pan i Pani Lis prowadzą szczęśliwe życie ze swoim ekscentrycznym synem Ashem. Wszystko się zmienia, kiedy Pan Lis knuje intrygę by dokonać największej kradzieży kurczaków jaką widział zwierzęcy świat.

programme.title: Aftershock
programme.desc: Dziewczynka ocalała po trzęsieniu ziemi opuszcza rodzinę, która myśli, że nie udało jej się przeżyć.

programme.title: Najczarniejsza godzina
programme.desc: Piątka młodzieńców musi zdać się na własne siły podczas próby przetrwania ataku obcych w Moskwie.

programme.title: Czas zabijania
programme.desc: Stare nawyki ciężko wykorzenić... Zwłaszcza na zmieniającym się południu USA. Carl Lee Hailey, pracownik fabryki w Mississippi dowiaduje się tego, gdy jego dziesięcioletnia siostra zostaje brutalnie napadnięta przez dwóch pijanych rasistów.

programme.title: Odrobina nieba
programme.desc: Marley jest piękna, młoda i odnosi sukcesy na każdym polu, oprócz spraw sercowych. Jej podejście do życia ulega zmianie, gdy wychodzi na jaw, że ma raka.

programme.title: Counterattack
programme.desc: Elitarny najemnik ucieka do dżungli po tym, jak został wrobiony w zabójstwo potentata naftowego. Towarzyszy mu reporterka, która ma dowód jego niewinności.

programme.title: Deadfall
programme.desc: Przygotujcie się na gęstą sieć uwodzenia, zdrady, zabójstwa i chciwości w ekscytującym thrillerze z udziałem Michaela Biehna, Jamesa Coburna i Nicolasa Cage'a.

programme.title: W 80 dni dookoła świata
programme.desc: Mamy rok 1872. Brytyjski wynalazca, chiński złodziej i francuski artysta wyruszają w mającą trwać 80 dni podróż dookoła świata. Korzystają z lądu, dróg powietrznych, mórz i łyżworolek. Wszystko po to, by wygrać walkę z czasem i skończyć tam, gdzie zaczęli.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Acrimony
programme.desc: Wierna żona jest rozwścieczona krętactwami swego męża, gdy staje się jasne, że ją zdradził.

programme.title: Benek Brawura i czerwone taksówki
programme.desc: Dziesięcioletni Benek postanawia uratować swojego najlepszego przyjaciela, taksówkarza Dussiflarda, kiedy ten wdaje się w mafijne porachunki.

programme.title: Klub samotnych mam
programme.desc: Grupa samotnych matek z różnych środowisk łączy się i tworzy grupę wsparcia, gdzie mogą omówić swoje problemy, znaleźć radość w przeszkodach życiowych i wykorzystać swoją wewnętrzną siłę, aby pokonać osobiste wyzwania.

programme.title: Rekin z jeziora
programme.desc: Policjantka z małego miasteczka musi obronić mieszkańców przed krwiożerczym rekinem.

programme.title: Wszystkie kobiety Mateusza
programme.desc: Mateusz Kłos jest artystą, hulaką i wielbicielem płci pięknej. Po swojej śmierci odwiedza w snach wszystkie kobiety, z którymi miał romans, co niepokoi ich mężów.

programme.title: Tucker: Konstruktor Marzeń
programme.desc: Konstruktor tworzy rewolucyjne projekty samochodów, które wstrząsają całym przemysłem motoryzacyjnym.

programme.title: Podziemny krąg
programme.desc: Oparta na debiutanckiej powieści Chucka Palanhiuka historia o zagubionym młodym mężczyźnie z niedalekiej przyszłości. Nie mając rodziny ani przyjaciół, często odwiedza grupy wsparcia dla chorych w celu tworzenia więzi z innymi.

programme.title: Zjawa
programme.desc: Hugh Glass zostaje zaatakowany przez niedźwiedzia. Ledwo żywy, pozostawiony na pewną śmierć, wbrew wszystkiemu stara się przeżyć. Zmagając się z bezlitosnymi zimowymi warunkami, desperacko brnie przez dzikie tereny, gnany miłością do rodziny i nieokiełznaną żądzą zemsty.

programme.title: Wyścig z czasem
programme.desc: W przyszłości, gdzie czas to dosłownie pieniądz, a proces starzenia zatrzymuje się w wieku 25 lat, jedyną metodą na utrzymanie się przy życiu jest zarobek, kradzież lub odziedziczenie pieniędzy.

programme.title: Złodziej tożsamości. Historia prawdziwa
programme.desc: Kiedy poniżony reporter gazety New York Times, Michael Finkel spotyka się z oskarżonym zabójcą Christianem Longo, który ukradł tożsamość Finkela, dochodzenie przemienia się w zabawę w kotka i myszkę.

programme.title: Operacja: Zemsta
programme.desc: Kiedy były żołnierz dowiaduje się o śmierci swojego najlepszego przyjaciela, postanawia dotrzeć do prawdy i wymierzyć sprawiedliwość winnym. stanowi jedynie część wielkiego spisku. Teraz będzie musiał po kolei eliminować sprawców.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: 17-letni David i 15-letnia Jade (Brooke Shields) znajdują się w namiętnym romansie.Ale w miarę jak ich związek staje się coraz bardziej intensywny, zaczyna się to robić - a kiedy David jest wykluczony z widzenia Jade, rozwija się łańcuch tragicznych wydarzeń.

programme.title: Sex Drive
programme.desc: Nastolatek rozpaczliwie, chcący stracić dziewictwo, przekonuje swoich przyjaciół, żeby pojechali z nim w podróż, aby mógł spotkać się z dziewczyną poznaną przez internet, ale wycieczka szybko zmienia się w serię zabawnych wpadek.

programme.title: Honor i siła
programme.desc: Do małego węgierskiego miasteczka przybywa Janos – charyzmatyczny i tajemniczy mężczyzna z wyraźnie przywódczymi aspiracjami, który z miejsca znajduje posłuch wśród dwóch młodych braci z trudnej rodziny.

programme.title: Daybreakers - Świt
programme.desc: Jest rok 2019 i nieznana plaga przekształciła światową ludzką populację w krwiożercze wampiry. Podczas gdy ludzie i ich krew stają się coraz rzadsze, wampiry muszą szukać nowych sposobów na zaspokojenie swoich pragnień.

programme.title: Sekretarka (Secretary)
programme.desc: Młoda kobieta (Maggie Gyllenhaal) zostaje wypuszczona ze szpitala psychiatrycznego i znajduje pracę jako sekretarka wymagającego prawnika (James Spader). Ich zawodowa relacja zamienia się w sadomasochistycznie seksualną.
